def is_near_cat():
    # Check if the character is close to a cat
    symbol near_cat = exists cat: item : is_cat(cat) and close_char(char, cat)
    return near_cat

def is_near_bathtub():
    # Check if the character is close to a bathtub
    symbol near_bathtub = exists tub: item : is_bathtub(tub) and close_char(char, tub)
    return near_bathtub

behavior move_cat_to_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)

behavior __goal__():

        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select a cat

        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select a bathtub

        if not is_near_cat():
            achieve close_char(char, cat)
            # Move close to the cat if not already near

        move_cat_to_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

def is_bathtub_full(bathtub:item):
    # Function to check if the bathtub is filled with water
    symbol full=has_water(bathtub)
    return full

behavior move_cat_to_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub) # Place the cat inside the bathtub

behavior shower_cat(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        if is_bathtub_full(bathtub):
            # If the bathtub is filled, proceed to shower the cat
            rinse(cat)

behavior dry_cat(cat:item, towel:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(towel) # Temporarily hold the towel to dry the cat
        scrub(cat)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat

        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select the bathtub

        bind towel: item where:
            is_towel(towel)
        # Select a towel

        move_cat_to_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
        shower_cat(cat, bathtub)
        dry_cat(cat, towel)
